info.title: Conserve API - Combined Documentation
info.description: Combined API documentation for Admin Dashboard and Super Admin Dashboard. This documentation includes all endpoints from both admin and super admin interfaces.

[SuperAdmin] Get dashboard summary

post.summary: [SuperAdmin] Create annual work plan with clean structure
post.description: Create an annual work plan using simplified clean structure with nested outputs, activities, sub-activities and details. Gets landscape_id from authenticated user, sets is_request_unlock to true, status to need_approval, and calculates totals bottom-up.

409.description: Conflict - Annual work plan already exists for this year, landscape, and component

put.summary: [SuperAdmin] Edit annual work plan with clean structure
put.description:
Edit an existing annual work plan using clean structure format.
This endpoint performs a full replacement of the nested hierarchy
(outputs, activities, sub-activities, and details) while maintaining
the same AWP ID and core metadata.

Key features:
- Full replacement of nested structure
- Bottom-up calculation of totals
- Validation of user permissions
- Status-based edit restrictions
- Transaction-based updates

Restrictions:
- Cannot edit approved work plans
- Cannot change year
- Must belong to user's landscape

400.description: Bad request - validation failed or invalid operation

source.description: Source of the exchange rate (config, API, default)

grand_total_idr.description: Grand total of all allocations in IDR

years_covered.description: List of years that have budget allocations

grand_total_usd.description: Grand total across all years in USD

grand_total_idr.description: Grand total across all years in IDR
